title: [R.G. Mechanics] Bioshock 2
description:
INFORMATION:
Year: 2010
Genre: Action, Shooter, 3D, 1st Person
Developer: 2K Marin, 2K China, 2K Australia and Digital Extremes
Publisher: 2K Games
Platform: PC
Publication Type: RiP
Language: RUS | ENG
Sound language: RUS | ENG
Tablet: ALI213

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
âœ” Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
âœ” Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3,0 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 3200+
âœ” Memory: 1 GB
âœ” Video Card: Nvidia Geforce 7800 or Radeon H1900
âœ” Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÂ® 9.0
âœ” Free hard drive space: 9.5 GB

DESCRIPTION:
10 years - a hefty time, even for the history of ordinary town, but under the water decade, comparable to eternity. During this time, the utopian city of enthusiasm even more outdated, and some of its parts completely at the mercy of the water. But it still smolders life - carnivorous, brutal, and always ready to fight. The most ruthless and cunning mutants still roam under the cracked dome in search of their own victims. And you will be confronted with them, so that you come back to Rapture ... 10 years later, after the unique action game in a small town on the Atlantic coast begin to make weird and naizloveschie things - there disappear tiny girls. Traces of the kidnapper lost in coastal waters, and it becomes obvious that you need to look for clues hidden under water. Under the dome Delight you come back in a new capacity - as the very first Grand Daddy, has maintained the will and mind.

Features:
- Weapons and hit. At the core of the game are still a genetic modification, but now you can concentrate in their hands even greater force. Use plasmid and firearms at the same time to obliterate enemies into powder!
- Dislocation and greatness. Grand underwater city made famous in the original game, was transformed. Ocean water as a need to work on it, the dome gave a leak, and some areas completely disappeared under the water. Journey through the majestic ruins will be one of the most exciting adventures in your life.
- Starring. Big Poppa. One of the most fearsome inhabitants of Delight is now in your hands. In the first part you reasonably feared Papochek and applied considerable effort and ingenuity to cope with them. Now, you yourself - one of them.
- Past Delight. Collective battles take you to a time when enthusiasm was still alive and thriving. You will become a member of genetic experiments and be able to fight for control of some of the underwater metropolis.
- Fighting for evolution. In the battles with other players, you earn points needed to get new weapons, plasmids and tonics. Fight for your evolution!

Features Ripa:
Bioshock 2:

- Do not recoded

- Version of the game - v 1.5

- Sewn on crack Vintex v1.08

- Cut multiplayer titles developers (Credits)

- Ability to select a combination of text and voice

- Ability to download you do not need no voiceovers (voices_ru.bin - Russian | voices_en.bin - English)



Additions:

- Minerva's Den (only English voice)

- The Protector Trials (only English voice)
